    • Method Detail

      • getFailedComponents

        public List<Component> getFailedComponents(Component root)

        Get a list of components that fail their respective validators. The component tree rooted at root is traversed and components whose validators fail will be added to the list. Only visible and enabled components will be validated.

        The validation messages can be retrieved using the ComponentImpl.getValidator() method to get the validator. The validator contains the messages.

        Parameters:
        root - The root component.
        Returns:
        List of Component objects, will be empty if all components pass validation.

      • getFailedValidators

        public List<Validator> getFailedValidators(Component root)
        Get a list of failed validators at the component root. Composite validators will be broken into their contained validators.
        Parameters:
        root - the root.
        Returns:
        List.

      • getInstance

        public static ValidatorUtil getInstance()
        Get an instance to use.
        Returns:
        ValidatorUtil.

      • validateComponentTree

        public boolean validateComponentTree(Component root,
                            net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable notifiable)
        Validate a component tree rooted at root.
        Parameters:
        root - the root of the component tree to validate.
        notifiable - the Notifiable to populate.
        Returns:
        true if all the components in the tree are valid; otherwise false.
